raw_text:
{
  "title": "点击 Primary Action 按钮触发未捕获的程序崩溃异常",
  "steps": [
    "访问本地开发环境 http://localhost:5173，进入 scenario: crash_01 页面",
    "在 Inputs 文本框中输入任意字符（如 'hola'）",
    "多次点击页面上的 'Primary Action' 按钮",
    "打开浏览器开发者工具 Console 面板观察报错信息"
  ],
  "expected": "点击按钮后应正常响应业务逻辑，控制台不应出现未捕获的错误日志",
  "actual": "控制台抛出 'Uncaught Error: Error triggered by user action' 红色错误，且 UI 提示 Category 为 crash",
  "environment": {
    "os": "Windows",
    "browser": "Chrome",
    "app_version": ""
  },
  "severity": "high",
  "tags": ["crash", "frontend", "console-error", "regression"],
  "confidence": 0.95
}

{
  "title": "点击 'Primary Action' 按钮导致 TypeError 崩溃",
  "steps": [
    "打开 Bug Genie 测试页面并定位到 scenario: crash_id 模块",
    "在 'Inputs' 输入框中输入任意文本内容（如 'test222'）",
    "点击 'Primary Action' 提交按钮",
    "观察 Local Log 记录及浏览器控制台输出"
  ],
  "expected": "系统应正常处理输入请求，不产生任何运行错误或崩溃",
  "actual": "系统抛出未捕获的错误 'Uncaught TypeError: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'crash')'，导致应用逻辑中断",
  "environment": {
    "os": "Windows",
    "browser": "Chrome",
    "app_version": ""
  },
  "severity": "critical",
  "tags": ["crash", "frontend", "type-error"],
  "confidence": 0.95
}
